name: angular-filter

class.name: LimitToFilter
class.preview: Creates a new List or String containing only a prefix/suffix of the elements as specified by the limit parameter.

class.name: JsonFilter
class.preview: Allows you to convert a JavaScript object into JSON string. This filter is mostly useful for debugging.

class.name: FilterFilter
class.preview: Selects a subset of items from the provided angular/dart-core.List and returns it as a new angular/dart-core.List.

class.name: DateFilter
class.preview: Formats date to a string based on the requested format. See Dart http://api.dartlang.org/docs/releases/latest/intl/DateFormat.html for full formating options.

class.name: CurrencyFilter
class.preview: Formats a number as a currency (ie $1,234.56). When no currency symbol is provided, '$' used.

packageIntro:
AngularDart

A port of Angular to Dart.

Installing

Follow the instructions on AngularDart's page on pub.

API Documentation

API documentation.

Learning more

Study the AngularDart Tutorial to learn more about Angular in Dart.

Joining the discussion

Discuss AngularDart on the mailing list, ask questions on StackOverflow, follow +AngularDart on Google+, and follow @AngularDart and @AngularJS on Twitter.

Filing bugs

Please file bugs and feature requests using the Github Issues Tracker.

I want to help
